description:
Legendary costumes for your SAMURAI WARRIORS officers will be added.
Enjoy fighting battles in an all-new way.

■Content
Legendary Costumes for:
Keiji Maeda, Nobunaga Oda, Mitsuhide Akechi, Oichi, Nō, Ranmaru Mori, Nagamasa Azai, Toshiie Maeda, Gracia, Katsuie Shibata, and Hisahide Matsunaga

■How to use
You can change costumes from camp by selecting "Party" - "Select Costume".
name: Legendary Costumes Samurai Warriors Pack 1
